tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_multi_stakeholder_partnership AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN aav.multi_stakeholder_partnership = TRUE THEN 'Yes' WHEN aav.multi_stakeholder_partnership = FALSE THEN 'No' ELSE '' END AS val, CASE WHEN aav.multi_stakeholder_partnership = TRUE THEN 1 WHEN aav.multi_stakeholder_partnership = FALSE THEN 2 ELSE -999999999 END AS val_id FROM amp_activity_version aav ORDER BY aav.amp_activity_id;
